name: recording_turnOff
description: This function is used to stop recording on a SmartThings device without turning it off.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to stop recording.

parameters.name: predefinedScreenPosition
parameters.description: A predefined screen position for the device.
